ISSUE.TITLE: Secrets not applied from now.json
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Looks like after https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/pull/508 the secrets are not applied. Previous version seems to work fine. I did not test if the same applies when the config is not in `now.json` but in `package.json`.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Run only tests for packages that changed (#515)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Make sure `cwd` user clean by using `cwd/.now` (#516)
